definitions.definition: A person, animal or plant living at a certain location or in a certain area.
definitions.example: The tiger lily is a resident of Asia.

definitions.definition: A bird which does not migrate during the course of the year.
A physician receiving specialized medical training.
definitions.example: She's a resident in neurosurgery at Mass General.

definitions.definition: A diplomatic representative who resides at a foreign court, usually of inferior rank to an ambassador.
A legal permanent resident, someone who maintains residency.
Dwelling, or having an abode, in a place for a continued length of time; residing on one's own estate.
definitions.example: resident in the city or in the country

definitions.definition: Based in a particular place; on hand; local.
definitions.example: He is our resident computer expert.

definitions.definition: (of memory) Currently loaded into RAM; contrasted with virtual memory.
The head spy in a rezidentura.
